item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. IMG_0001 (284 points | 49 comments)
2. OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon Transport Tycoon Deluxe (38 points | 6 comments)
3. A particle physics course for high-school students (68 points | 2 comments)
4. Egoless Engineering (456 points | 167 comments)
5. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (469 points | 247 comments)
6. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (389 points | 564 comments)
7. Show HN: Open-Source Colab Notebooks to Implement Advanced RAG Techniques (24 points | 3 comments)
8. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (124 points | 19 comments)
9. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (143 points | 122 comments)
10. No Nat November: My Month Without IPv4 (55 points | 17 comments)
11. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (223 points | 69 comments)
12. The Tube Computer (156 points | 49 comments)
13. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (126 points | 39 comments)
14. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (83 points | 19 comments)
15. Making AWS News stupid fast with smart caching (12 points | 1 comment)
16. Gratitude despite the odds (26 points | 2 comments)
17. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (55 points | 15 comments)
18. Formaldehyde Causes More Cancer Than Any Other Toxic Air Pollutant (80 points | 28 comments)
19. EmacsConf 2024 (68 points | 1 comment)
20. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (394 points | 68 comments)
21. A new home for Python-build-standalone (60 points | 13 comments)
22. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (211 points | 199 comments)
23. The Porsche Macan EV is being recalled because its headlights are too bright (38 points | 58 comments)
24. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (22 points | discuss)
25. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
26. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (130 points | 155 comments)
27. Rust library for building no-boilerplate CLI apps (33 points | 5 comments)
28. Stephen King to shut down his 3 radio stations in Maine (78 points | 115 comments)
29. Show HN: Book and change flights with one email (72 points | 30 comments)
30. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (47 points | 9 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
